channel.title: Publications on Sundar
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Sundar

item.title: Tooling in Maching Learning Lifecycle
item.description: This talk was on the importance of tooling in a ML development lifecyle. Importance of tracking the various metrics involved in training the model - training parameters, training results Tieing up the model with the datasets and the training params Packaging the model in a standard format to be later deployed to any modern tech stack.

item.title: Journey from Monolith to Microservices - AWS Story
item.description: This was a workshop cum training program for faculties of engineering colleges across India. I had the chance to talk about the evolution of modern day architecture - Cloud Native, Microservices.
